verses.verse: Sing <S%H7442><s%>, O barren <S%H6135><s%>, thou that didst not bear <S%H3205><s%>; break forth <S%H6476><s%> into singing <S%H7440><s%>, and cry aloud <S%H6670><s%>, thou that didst not travail with child <S%H2342><s%>: for more <S%H7227><s%> are the children <S%H1121><s%> of the desolate <S%H8074><s%> than the children <S%H1121><s%> of the married wife <S%H1166><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

For a small <S%H6996><s%> moment <S%H7281><s%> have I forsaken <S%H5800><s%> thee; but with great <S%H1419><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> will I gather <S%H6908><s%> thee.

In a little <S%H8241><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> I hid <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from thee for a moment <S%H7281><s%>; but with everlasting <S%H5769><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> will I have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on thee, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy Redeemer <S%H1350><s%>.

For this is as the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> unto me: for as I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> should no more go over <S%H5674><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>; so have I sworn <S%H7650><s%> that I would not be wroth <S%H7107><s%> with thee, nor rebuke <S%H1605><s%> thee.

For the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall depart <S%H4185><s%>, and the hills <S%H1389><s%> be removed <S%H4131><s%>; but my kindness <S%H2617><s%> shall not depart <S%H4185><s%> from thee, neither shall the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of my peace <S%H7965><s%> be removed <S%H4131><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that hath mercy <S%H7355><s%> on thee.
